titleStmt.title: The seuen soueraigne medicines and salues, to be diligently applied to the seuen deadly wounds and sores.
The seuen soueraigne medicines and salues, to be diligently applied to the seuen deadly wounds and sores.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Simon Stafford, dwelling in Hosier lane, neere Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: With a decorative border around the text.
Verse - "Pride, and humility. Pride is the first and cheifest sore,"
Printed in two columns; text is mostly in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
